snippet: There are several apps, mostly free, to organize the numerous photos on your phone.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column notes several apps, mostly free, to organize numerous photos on a smartphone.
lead_paragraph: There are several apps, mostly free, to organize the numerous photos on your phone.

headline.print_headline: A Phone Full of Photos, Now Beautifully Organized
headline.main: Organization Help for Turning Phone Photos Into Albums
